alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brewster and southeastern Presidio Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chisos Basin, or 12 miles west of Panther Junction, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lajitas, Panther Junction, Chisos Basin, Study Butte, Castolon, Big Bend National Park, Terlingua, Terlingua Ranch Airport, Terlingua Ranch Lodge and Barton Warnock Environmental Educational Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Presidio Valley
